summary: Replaces a part of a date
description: Replaces a part of a given date string with a new value based on the provided unit, allowing for easy replacing of dates.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date (and optionally time) to replace.

If the given date doesn't include the time, the process assumes that the time component is `00:00:00Z` (i.e. midnight, in UTC). The millisecond part of the time is optional and defaults to `0` if not given.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The period of time in the unit given to replace the existing value.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description:
The unit for the value given. The following pre-defined units are available:

- millisecond: Milliseconds
- second: Seconds .
- minute: Minutes
- hour: Hours
- day: Days - changes only the the day part of a date
- month: Months
- year: Years

Replacements with the unit `year`, `month` or `day` do never change the time.

returns.description: The date with replaced value. If a time component was given in the parameter `date`, the time component is returned with the date.
